headline: The 28 Best Tech Gifts of 2024, According to Our Gadget Gurus
summary: PERSONAL TECHNOLOGY When tech gifts solve problems and improve lives, they’re not just for the geeks, they’re for everyone. The proof is in this guide, which features only gear we tested ourselves and loved.
